entry.title: Marvel's 'Secret Invasion' Show Uses Generative AI—And Fans and Creators Are Livid
entry.summary: "It's utterly horrifying," said one artist of the realization that Marvel's latest comic book adaptation tapped AI tools.

entry.title: Bitcoin Cash, Stacks, and Pepe Lead Alts Parade as Bitcoin Breaks Above $29,000
entry.summary: Bitcoin has brought the rest of the market with it as it closes in on $30,000, as altcoins follow in its wake.

entry.title: Bitcoin Hits $29,000 Following BlackRock, WisdomTree, Invesco ETF Filings
entry.summary: The largest cryptocurrency has reclaimed $29,000 amid a wave of ETF filings in the U.S. and rising interest from institutional investors.

entry.title: Ledger Investor Bpifrance Exploring ZK Proofs, AI
entry.summary: Publicly funded investment bank Bpifrance looms large in the French crypto scene. The firm’s crypto lead shared insights on its Web3 fund with Decrypt.

entry.title: Wimbledon 2023 to Feature AI-Generated Highlights Commentary
entry.summary: The Grand Slam tennis championship will use IBM’s artificial intelligence tech to produce audio commentary for highlights packages.

entry.title: Federal Agencies Form New U.S. Crypto Crime Task Force
entry.summary: The Darknet Marketplace and Digital Currency Crimes Task Force formalizes a prior collaboration between five law enforcement agencies.

entry.title: WisdomTree, Invesco Follow BlackRock With Spot Bitcoin ETF Applications
entry.summary: The SEC is facing a fresh wave of spot Bitcoin ETF applications from major investment firms, in the wake of BlackRock's filing.

entry.title: AI Chatbots Like ChatGPT and Google Bard Don’t Meet EU Law Standards: Study
entry.summary: The Stanford study also confirmed that open source models are much more transparent than the more popular—and profitable—models like ChatGPT and Bard.

entry.title: Bored Ape Creator's 'HV-MTL Forge' Mech Game Revealed
entry.summary: The workshop-building game will launch on June 29 and use HV-MTL robot NFTs that previous Sewer Pass holders claimed.

entry.title: Ava Labs Is the Latest Crypto Network to Launch an AI Chatbot
entry.summary: AvaGPT uses ChatGPT's API to quickly answer Avalanche network queries with immediate access to the source material.

entry.title: Bitcoin Breaks $28K for the First Time Since May
entry.summary: News of BlackRock's upcoming Bitcoin ETF filing sparked optimism in an otherwise battered and bruised crypto market.

entry.title: Welcome to the Circus: Top 5 Absurd AI Tools You Should Try in 2023
entry.summary: We've got Twitter bots roasting humans, your photos turned into memes, AI cats, and more.

entry.title: The Metaverse is Coming to Bitcoin, Declares Bitmap Theory
entry.summary: The project revolves around the idea that people can own individual blocks, leading to an inscription frenzy.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Iris Energy Shares Pop 21% After Major Hash Rate Expansion Plans
entry.summary: After shrinking briefly in November, Iris Energy’s mining capacity is making a rapid comeback.

entry.title: Snap Into the 'Meataverse'—Slim Jim Gives Away Free 'GigaJims' NFTs
entry.summary: Snack brand Slim Jim's oddball Web3 play includes 10,000 free "GigaJims" NFTs on Polygon, which are available now.

entry.title: AI Answers the Age-Old Question: What Came First, the Chicken or the Egg?
entry.summary: While ChatGPT typically couches answers in disclaimers, OpenAI’s generative chatbot doesn’t hesitate when asked the fowl riddle.

entry.title: Charles Schwab, Citadel-Backed Startup Is Building Crypto 'Plumbing' for Big Banks
entry.summary: The startup has said it's bringing the best of Wall Street to a technology aimed at replacing it.

entry.title: There's a Fake Trezor Wallet in the Apple App Store Draining Crypto
entry.summary: A malicious Trezor app has appeared on the Apple App Store under the fake name "Trezor Wallet Suite."

entry.title: Fortnite's Collab With Nike's NFT Platform Doesn't Include In-Game NFTs
entry.summary: The Nike-themed Fortnite world doesn't feature the use of in-game NFTs, but it's still tied into Nike's .Swoosh NFT user IDs.

entry.title: Binance US Market Share Evaporates as SEC Case Looms
entry.summary: Binance US started the year with 8% of the U.S. market share. Trading volume on the exchange has also dipped to yearly lows.

entry.title: AI-Driven Generative Art: Art That Responds to Input
entry.summary: Code Canvas and Art Blocks are examples of platforms built with the assistance of blockchain tools which allow users to quickly and easily mint high-quality NFTs.

entry.title: 'Play-to-Earn Is Not Dead. It Will Never Die' Says Words with Friends Creator Paul Bettner
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard Creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on Axie Infinity and Web3 games.

entry.title: Deutsche Bank Applies for Digital Asset Custody License in Germany: Report
entry.summary: Germany’s largest bank, with assets worth $1.3 trillion, has been working on the custody platform for over two years.

entry.title: Binance Issues Another Cease and Desist to ‘Scam’ Company, Second In A Week
entry.summary: Binance has dismissed recent reports claiming that it has a UK office based at a premises shared with thousands of other companies.

entry.title: Binance Set to Integrate Bitcoin Lightning Network for Deposits and Withdrawals
entry.summary: The crypto exchange is running Lightning nodes ahead of fully integrating Bitcoin Lightning Network payments.

entry.title: Elon Musk Loses Key Litigator Amid Lawsuit Over Dogecoin Insider Trading Claims
entry.summary: The withdrawal of Adam Gabor comes after a letter last week regarding his newest in-house attorney, Allison Huebert.

entry.title: The 'Napoleon Dynamite' Cast Is Finally Back Together. You Can Thank NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt was onsite as the cast of cult classic "Napoleon Dynamite" reunited for an animated pilot set to release exclusively to NFT holders.

entry.title: Improbable Opens Up the Tech Behind the Bored Ape Metaverse
entry.summary: The “stupidly ambitious” MSquared project, as Improbable CEO Herman Narula describes it, launches its metaverse-building tools.

entry.title: Bitcoin Reclaims Over 50% Market Dominance Following BlackRock ETF Filing
entry.summary: The SEC’s crackdown against altcoins is boosting Bitcoin’s share of the crypto market.

entry.title: Etherscan Touts ChatGPT Integration But Highlights The Chatbot's Flaws
entry.summary: Adding ChatGPT to its new Code Reader tool, Etherscan aims to enhance understanding of Ethereum source code.

entry.title: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Gets a Bullish Bump After BlackRock ETF Filing
entry.summary: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) jumped more than 12% on Friday in reaction to BlackRock filing its Bitcoin ETF application.

entry.title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Prospects Boost Institutional Investor Sentiment
entry.summary: BlackRock’s ETF gambit is significant news, but not enough to tip institutional investors back into crypto funds.

entry.title: Crypto Laws Enter Final Stages of UK Parliamentary Process
entry.summary: Stablecoins and cryptocurrency regulation are set to become UK law as the Financial Services and Markets Bill enters its final stages.

entry.title: Crypto.com Is Trading on Its Own Exchange, Insists That’s Totally Fine
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency exchange Crypto.com has staff trading tokens for profit, the Financial Times has reported.

entry.title: Binance UK Subsidiary Cancels Unused FCA Permissions
entry.summary: The UK subsidiary of the world’s largest crypto exchange has canceled its registration with the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).

entry.title: Bank of England-Backed Project: CBDCs Could Enable 'Programmability' for Money
entry.summary: The ‘Project Rosalind’ software trial found that central bank digital currencies could enable smart contract-like features for transactions.

entry.title: Animoca Brands CEO Robby Yung: Expect ‘Triple-A Console-Style’ Web3 Games in 2024
entry.summary: The Web3 gaming mogul expects to see a hybrid model emerge for the industry, encompassing casual titles, triple-A games and more.

entry.title: Binance Issues Cease and Desist to Nigerian ‘Scammer Entity’
entry.summary: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao denounced "Binance Nigeria Limited" as a fraudulent company in a post on Twitter.

entry.title: Crypto Payments Firm Wyre Winding Down Due to ‘Market Conditions’
entry.summary: The crypto payments firm is ceasing operations less than a year after it was valued at $1.5 billion in an abortive acquisition by Bolt.

entry.title: Terra Co-Founder Do Kwon Sentenced to Four Months in Prison for Forged Passports
entry.summary: Terraform Labs’ CEO Do Kwon told a court in Montenegro he never had any intentions of forging his travel documents.

entry.title: ‘Explain This Bob’ AI Twitter Bot Suspended After Elon Musk Calls it ‘Scam Crypto Account’
entry.summary: The move marks an abrupt about-face for Musk, who had previously engaged with the bot's content on Twitter.

entry.title: Cross the Ages Game Review: A Tough But Rewarding Card Battler
entry.summary: Cross the Ages is a digital collectible card game that challenges players to duel online opponents—and you can even mint your cards as tradable NFTs. It's complex and difficult to grasp at first, but this mobile-first game has some serious strategic upside. GG contributor Ryan Gladwin puts Cross the Ages through its paces.

entry.title: "AI Is Game-Changing But Needs Fact-Checking": AlchemyAI Project Lead
entry.summary: In this interview, Decrypt's Jason Nelson chats with Alchemy product manager and AlchemyAI project lead Elan Halpern on blockchain analysis using ChatGPT, what AI means for better user experience, and the need to fact-check AI. Halpern also gives a demo of the new AlchemyAI ChatGPT plugin.

entry.title: Fractal Is Like an Arcade, Says Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan
entry.summary: Justin Kan was a co-founder of Twitch and now works on Fractal, a Web3 gaming startup. Kan tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his new company and what he's up to.

entry.title: Are NFTs the Next SEC Target?
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin discusses the current regulatory climate in the U.S. with Gala Games' President of Blockchain Jason Brink.

entry.title: Collab.Land Co-Founder Said There Was No ‘Aha Moment’ When Launching DAO Toolkit
entry.summary: CCO and co-founder of Collab.Land Anjali Young explained at this year’s NFC Lisbon the origins of the crypto community tool kit, which industry niches are turning to its suite of products, and what’s next for the project since its token distribution event last February.

entry.title: Buying a Slice of H.R. Giger's 'Alien' Is Fine Art, Not Memorabilia: Particle CEO
entry.summary: With H.R. Giger's original "Alien" statue on full display at this year's NFC Lisbon, Particle CEO Harold Eytan told Decrypt that owning an NFT-ified slice of the piece isn't just for fans of the iconic creature and movie series but also for fine art collectors. Interested in owning a piece? Be prepared to cough up half an ETH for one of the 500 tranches of the digitized sculpture.

entry.title: Community Co-Creation 'Is a Big Step for Fashion Brands' Entering the Metaverse: BNV Founder and CEO
entry.summary: The founder and CEO of metaverse fashion platform BNV Richard Hobbs said big brands are still nervous to let fans and community members customize their favorite garments. Still, he believes that as long as you can meet a firm's commercial bottom lines while stirring engagement, there's nothing to lose.

entry.title: Standard Crypto VC Co-Founder on NFTs and Their Stigma in Gaming
entry.summary: Alok Vasudev is a co-founder of venture capital firm Standard Crypto. In an interview with Decrypt's Kate Irwin, he shares his thoughts on NFT marketing, NFT utility in gaming, and the stigma that pervades the industry.

entry.title: Ava Labs Announces Avalanche Arcad3 for Game Developers at 3XP
entry.summary: Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang shares news with Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the crypto firm's latest push to help traditional game developers break into blockchain gaming.

entry.title: ‘Like a Middle Finger to Western Culture’: YuYu Unpacks Inspiration Behind NFT Expo GAG
entry.summary: At this year’s NFC Lisbon, multimedia artist and photographer YuLiang "YuYu" Liu broke down how themes from traditional painting and BDSM informed his latest NFT exhibition called “GAG.” He also shared exclusively with Decrypt a yet-to-be-launched drop for fans of his work.

entry.title: 'Competition Was Rather Low' in Mobile Wallet Space, Says Zerion Head of Growth
entry.summary: Zerion's move to launch a mobile-first crypto wallet not only helped NFT users swap jpegs on the go but was also a play to get away from crypto's desktop-centric user experience. And with such little competition, Zerion's head of growth Alexander Guy told Decrypt at NFC Lisbon it's managed to rake in 150,000 funded wallets. Next step? Taking on MetaMask and contending as a browser-extension wallet.

entry.title: ‘We’ve Never Seen Anything Like This in VR’, Says The Sandbox COO on Apple’s Vision Pro Headset
entry.summary: The Sandbox COO Sebastien Borget told Decrypt at this year’s NFC Lisbon that despite the high price point, Apple’s new VR headset is nonetheless “groundbreaking.” And though the tech giant never used the term “metaverse” in its reveal, Borget is sure that the technology will be key in growing participation in various digital worlds.

entry.title: Is Gala Safe? Gala Games Head of Blockchain on GALA, Crypto, and SEC Regulatory Turmoil
entry.summary: Gala Games President of Blockchain shares his thoughts on the GALA token upgrade and the latest SEC turmoil with Decrypt's Kate Irwin.

entry.title: Artists Adopting NFTs Has Been ‘Really Market Dependent’, Says NFT Club Berlin’s Rebekka Revel
entry.summary: Getting non-crypto artists to make the leap into Web3 comes in ebbs and flows according to the market’s bear and bull waves, says co-founder of NFT Club Berlin and Superteam Germany Rebekka Revel. But she’s hoping to change that by changing the narrative around digital collectibles, regardless of the market, one word at a time.

entry.title: Big Brands Exploring Web3 to ‘Scale Up Their Super-fan Base’: Superduper Co-founder
entry.summary: Co-founder and co-CEO of Web3 media brand Superduper Dom Smith says big brands are eager to enter the space—they just don’t know how. Still, they all maintain a thesis of turning their communities into “super fans” that generate value for users as well as a firm’s bottom line.

entry.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs
entry.summary: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.

entry.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap
entry.summary: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.

entry.title: Why 'Words With Friends' Creator Paul Bettner is 'Allergic' to Pay-to-Win NFTs
entry.summary: Words With Friends and Wildcard creator Paul Bettner tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about his perspective on what to do when NFTs become in-game characters and assets.

entry.title: Twitch Co-Founder Justin Kan: 18 Months is 'Several Decades' in Crypto
entry.summary: Fractal and Twitch co-founder Justin Kan gives Decrypt's Kate Irwin an update on all things Fractal and his perspective on blockchain technology in gaming.
